text: Agioi Apostoloi is a beach in village of Chania in the municipal unit in South Greece, West side of Crete Island, Greece.Agioi Apostoloi, Chania That is located near on the seaside of Crete island. ==See also== *Chania *List of settlements in the Chania regional unit ==References== Category:Beaches of Crete
title: Agioi Apostoloi, Chania
